content.description: The following question refers to the topic of sixteenth-century art.
content.question: Mannerist painters differed from earlier Renaissance artists primarily in their

choices.label: reliance on the patronage of wealthy individuals, monarchs, or church leaders
deliberate use of distortion and elongation

content.answer: deliberate use of distortion and elongation

topic.text: 2.7: Art of the 16th Century: Mannerism and Baroque Art

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
